p: According to the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) guidelines, investigators in the US wishing to study the use of convalescent plasma in a clinical trial should submit requests to the FDA for investigational use under the traditional investigational new drug (IND) regulatory pathway [ 35]. The suggested patient eligibility criteria are as follows: (1) Laboratory confirmed COVID-19; (2) severe or immediately life-threatening disease; and (3) Informed consent provided by the patient or a healthcare proxy.
